```{r SETUP, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=T)

myname <- "Martin"
```




```{r, echo=TRUE}
knitr::knit_hooks$set(small.mar = function(before) {
    if (before) par(mar = c(5, 5, 5, 5))  
})
```


```{r}
plot(rnorm(1000))
```

```{r, small.mar = TRUE}
plot(rnorm(1000))
```



```{r}
default_message_hook <- knitr::knit_hooks$get("message")
print(default_message_hook)
knitr::knit_hooks$set(
  message = function(x, options) {
    return(sprintf("<span style='color: red;'>%s</span>", x))
  }
)
```


```{r}
message("Hi Martin")
```
